long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Meet the Cast browser extension; the tool that allows you to work where you are, and automate your workflows with supported 3rd party platforms. If you have a Nexio MID, you can use this extension to create and run a payment for an open invoice. These transactions can then be linked to an existing invoice in the supported 3rd party platform utilizing our AI automation.
